query:
SELECT 
  tc.id as inspection_id,
  tc.taskId,
  tc.templateId,
  tc.status,
  tc.stage,
  COUNT(cir.id) as item_count
FROM taskChecklists tc
LEFT JOIN checklistItemResults cir ON cir.taskChecklistId = tc.id
WHERE tc.id = 30001
GROUP BY tc.id, tc.taskId, tc.templateId, tc.status, tc.stage;
